Text: Dah.... why the RPM format..?? well well, i'll transform it to a .tgz then

Just download the textfile in this torrent that contains the serial and then get .rpm or .deb from here:
http://www.nero.com/en/nerolinux-prog.php?pak=13

Just use alien on any Debian based distro.

sudo alien package.rpm

it will make it a .deb file

cheers
;-)
